Comments_List: How to think about solving a data problem. Methods for linear and nonlinear fitting, common statistics, and modeling.
Coding and data analysis skills using matlab.
I learned little bit about data analysis methods
Course notes could be rewritten to facilitate studying rather than the lecture. It was difficult to review the lecture notes after class.
Was a bit theoretical, could do with more practical examples.

The course was taught in a manner that made it inapplicable to many students. It will be very relevant for imaging students but much much less so for wet lab work. I wish more examples had been used that would be seen in a wet lab scenario with smaller sample sizes. Also the PET section was completely irrelevant to the course as a whole and should not have been taught.
Take it if you want to develop a framework for biomedical data analysis.
Yes. Data analysis using matlab is a very critical skill for biomedical engineering research.
No. It was a high course load with little benefit.
